 *   php artisan make:enum Languages --table=languages --id=id --slug=name --value=name --force
 */

namespace App\Enums;

class Languages
{
    public const SLOVENCINA = 1;
    public const CESTINA = 2;
    public const AFRICA_AND_MIDDLE_EAST = 3;
    public const AMERICAS = 4;

    public static function map(): array
    {
        return [
            static::SLOVENCINA => 'Slovenčina',
            static::CESTINA => 'Čeština',
            static::AFRICA_AND_MIDDLE_EAST => 'Africa and Middle East',
            static::AMERICAS => 'Americas',
        ];
    }
}
